disagapp 0.0.1
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    agg_uniform()

    Create a uniform aggregation raster

    agg_upload()

    Upload an aggregation raster

    agg_worldpop()

    Download an aggregation raster from WorldPop

    cov_access()

    Download accessibility data from Malaria Atlas Project

    cov_bioclim()

    Download bioclimatic data from Bioclim

    cov_landuse()

    Download land use data from Copernicus Global Land Service

    cov_nightlight()

    Download nighttime illumination data from using blackmarbler

    cov_upload()

    Upload covariates

    cov_water()

    Download data on the distance to water from ArcGIS

    create_module()

    Create a disagapp module

    disagapp-package disagapp

    disagapp: A modular platform for creating reproducible applications

    fit_fit()

    Fit a disaggregation model

    get_nasa_token()

    Fetch a token from the NASA API

    pred_pred()

    Get predictions from a disaggregation model

    pred_transfer()

    Transfer predictions to a new country

    prep_correlation()

    Produce a correlation matrix of covariates

    prep_scale()

    Scale the covariates

    prep_summary()

    Summarise properties of raster data

    register_module()

    Register a disagapp module

    resp_combine()

    Merge response data with a shapefile

    resp_download()

    Merge response data with a downloaded shapefile

    resp_edit()

    Remove polygons from response data

    resp_shape()

    Upload response data from a shapefile

    resp_simplify()

    Simplify geometry of boundary data

    run_disagapp()

    Run disagapp Application
